data.name: My Gaming Club
data.detailed_description:
My Gaming Club - gaming club simulator

You have to raise your business from knees, the only thing you have at the start is an old garage that you inherited from the deceased Uncle Ben

What is this game about?
You are the owner of a gaming club, visitors come to you every day who are eager to play various computer games. Your goal is to develop in order to meet their needs as much as possible, and at the same time make a profit from it

What am I going to do?
It's just like in real life, only you work in a gaming club. Accordingly, your actions are to buy equipment, food, clean up and equip your club

What is special about this game and how does it differ from other games of this genre?
  • The game has many elements of real life (hunger, thirst, urine, mood, freedom of action, etc.)
  • The ability to assemble a PC from components
  • A smartphone with many applications and functions (Camera, Wallet, Calendar, Calls, Notes, etc.)
  • Ibay online auction, where you can sell and buy things
  • Incredibly smart AI that won't make you bored
  • Realistic car (realistic physics, fuel, oil, coolant, engine overheating, light, battery)
  • Realistic environment that will allow you to fully immerse yourself in the game world

data.short_description: In the game My Gaming Club you can feel exactly what it's like to own a gaming club, because realism is one of the main features of the game. Assemble PC, buy furniture, food for your club and for your visitors. This game is not just a gaming club simulator, this game is a real life simulator
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% compatible with DirectX 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 @ 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% compatible with DirectX 10
